featured.text: In a panic (B) With delight (C) Out of sorrow (D) Filled with embarrassment 39. (A) they had seen my car (B) there was a shop nearby (C) they had seen two small girls (D) there was a police station in the neighborhood 40.
To bring the evil eye into the home is thus believed to invite trouble and sorrow.

definition.zh_def: 悲傷；痛苦的情感或狀態。
definition.en_def: A feeling of deep distress caused by loss, disappointment, or other misfortune.
definition.example: She felt a deep sorrow after losing her beloved pet.
